attributes.action: Establish a Tax benifit for living within 2 miles of a persons place of work or Childs School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce income tax/council tax or offer morgage tax relief if a persons home residence is located within a 2 mile radius (e.g. walking distance) of thier regular place of work, or thier childs school or college.
